Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Company Introduction
Hangzhou Shiyin Technology Co., Ltd., established in 2015, is a company specializing in the research, development, and manufacturing of food 3D printing equipment. Dedicated to the independent development of consumer-grade food 3D printers, the company leverages intelligent manufacturing to achieve digitized dining solutions, catering to people’s personalized dietary needs.

Company Advantages
The company relies on three cutting-edge R&D teams: the National CAD Graphics Laboratory, Zhejiang University’s 3D Printing Laboratory, and the Industrial Design Department of Zhejiang University. It has obtained multiple core invention patents for food 3D printing technology, as well as design patents and other intellectual property rights.

The company and its products have been honored with numerous awards, including the 2017 China Consumer Electronics Leader Innovation Award, the “Smart Experience Award” in the 2017 6th China International Consumer Electronics LEADER Innovation Awards, the 2016 Most Innovative Enterprise Award in China’s 3D Printing Industry, and the title of Winning Enterprise in the 2016 Qualcomm Ventures & Sequoia Capital Frontier Tech Startup Competition.
